definition: Groups of people organized around shared activities, interests, or collaborative work.

positive_examples: The local chess club meets every Tuesday evening at the community center.
Our university's marching band performed at halftime during the football game.
The basketball league announced the playoff schedule for next month.
The ship's crew worked together to navigate through the storm.
The cross-functional team included engineers, designers, and marketing specialists.
She joined the photography club to meet other enthusiasts in her area.
negative_examples: The corporation announced quarterly earnings that exceeded expectations.
The government agency issued new regulations for environmental protection.
The hospital opened a new wing dedicated to cardiac surgery.
Apple released its latest smartphone model with enhanced features.
The university established a new research institute for artificial intelligence.
The nonprofit foundation donated millions to disaster relief efforts.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Corporation, GovernmentAgency, Institution, Company
